readop.managers.parameters module¶

Interactions with DDVE Parameter system.

class readop.managers.parameters.ParameterManager[source]¶

Bases: object

Handles credential management and re-authentication for rest http communication.

get_parameters(storage_unit_name: str) → readop.models.parameters.Parameters[source]¶

Returns the parameters currently set on the storage unit.

Parameters:storage_unit_name – storage unit to retrieve parameters from
Returns:parameters currently set on the storage unit
set_parameters(storage_unit_name: str, parameters: readop.models.parameters.Parameters) → None[source]¶

Sets the parameters on the specified storage unit.

Parameters:
  • storage_unit_name – storage unit to set parameters on.
  • parameters – parameter values to be set.
Returns:
